ComicInfo.Summary:
PAY THE DEVIL HIS DUE! Mephisto and Weasel have come for Deadpool! Will Good Night finally get his vengeance? Can Deadpool survive? And what will be left of him?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------|---------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Nic Klein | 1 | | Var | Carnage-ized Variant Cover | Skottie Young | 2 |
